Employment History Forescout Technologies UK : July 2019 to Present Role: ICS Security Consultant  •  Assist organisations in managing Cyber Risk in their Industrial environments through Asset Inventory, Deep Packet Inspection/Analysis, Industrial Threat Monitoring and Vulnerability Management. • Design and Implementation of Proof of Concept studies including integration with Industrial partner and customer systems and Networks across Oil and Gas, Manufacturing, Energy, Transportation and Water verticals. • Support Account Managers in demonstrating SilentDefense product capabilities. • Perform Cyber and Physical Security assessments and Network communication traffic analysis  • Collaborate with Customer security vendors/partners to ensuring strategic requirements are met. • Production of customer reports and slides detailing Industrial Security findings, observations and recommendations including those beyond Forescout product capabilities. • Creation of technical content in response to customer RFI/RFP/RFQ. • Close collaboration with Product Management, Engineering and vendor teams on product defects, enhancements or quality issues to aid roadmap planning.  • Work closely with commercial account teams providing regular updates on project progress, issue and risks. Identify upsell opportunities and potential future development to enhance solutions and support key customer initiatives.    Lockheed Martin/Leidos Cyber/Capgemini : Jan 2016 to July 2019 Role: Senior Solution Architect  • End to End solution architecture and design for complex active Industrial and Enterprise Security projects including Asset, Event, Change, Policy and Vulnerability Management. • Technical support of International sales team worldwide opportunities across Enterprise and OT markets with a specific focus on Industrial verticals. • Presentation and demonstration of products and services to customers both remotely and onsite.   • Work with support teams to gather user feedback, identify recurrent issues, design and expedite problem resolution where necessary.   • Guide customers on one or more solutions in terms of use, implementation and expansion of the solutions across their organization.  • Analysis of customer networks and endpoints in order to support the production of best fit, cost effective solutions.
